item.title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake – 37 minutes of TGS 2025 gameplay
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Featuring Eiko Kano's Critikano Hit.

Publisher and developer Square Enix, and developer Artdink Corporation premiered 37 minutes of live gameplay from Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake‘s new seabed content during a Tokyo Game Show 2025 stage event.

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on October 30. Read more about the game here, here, here, and here.

Watch the footage below.

Gameplay

(Gameplay footage from 23:04 to 1:00:17.)



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/dragon-quest-i-ii-hd-2d-remake-37-minutes-of-tgs-2025-gameplay

item.title: Dear me, I was… coming to Switch
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Currently available for Switch 2.

Arc System Works will release a Switch version of interactive adventure game Dear me, I was…, the company announced. A release date was not announced.

Dear me, I was… first launched for Switch 2 via Nintendo eShop on July 31.

In addition to the Switch version, Arc System Works has also released the game’s original soundtrack via streaming services like Spotify and Apple Music.

Here is an overview of the game, via Arc System Works:

Dear me, I was… is an interactive adventure that lets you enjoy a story woven with beautiful visuals, fusing the vibrant watercolor style of Taisuke Kanasaki with rotoscoping technology. The lifelike characters are sure to deeply move your heart.

In this story, you will relive the life of a certain woman. Experience joy, sorrow, and growth through her ordinary and humble life. Witness the story she weaves in a life interconnected with others.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/dear-me-i-was-coming-to-switch

item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds x Final Fantasy XIV collaboration event quest ‘Planetes Protocol (Savage)’ announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Available on September 29.

Capcom has announced the Monster Hunter Wilds x Final Fantasy XIV speical collaboration permanent quest “Planetes Protocol.” It will become available on September 29.

Here is an overview of the quest, via Capcom:

For hunters seeking a true test of their skills, Omega Planetes offers an extreme challenge to those that have already proven their worth in the “Planetes Protocol” quest.

Introducing the high-difficulty, permanent quest, “Planetes Protocol (Savage).” Hunters that successfully fulfil their duty will earn materials to craft new weapons and armor unique to this challenging hunt, as well as being rewarded with a special pendant and gesture!

Monster Hunter Wilds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Final Fantasy XIV Special Collaboration: Planetes Protocol (Savage) Quest Reveal Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/monster-hunter-wilds-x-final-fantasy-xiv-collaboration-event-quest-planetes-protocol-savage-announced

item.title: Suikoden STAR LEAP ‘HQ Functions’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

An introduction to your home base.

Publisher Konami and developer MYTHRIL have released a new trailer for Suikoden STAR LEAP, introducing the free-to-play strategy RPG‘s home base systems like hunts, the smithy, crests, mini-games (fishing, harvesting vegetables, mining, and so on), the suggestions box, dinner parties, and more.

Suikoden STAR LEAP will be available for PC via Steam, iOS, and Android. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch the trailer below.

HQ Functions Trailer

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/suikoden-star-leap-hq-functions-trailer

item.title: Narrative-driven action survival game Project Retrograde: The Becoming announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Uncover the cause of the apocalypse.

Chinese studio Invercity Game Works has announced Project Retrograde: The Becoming, a narrative-driven action survival game coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

Doomsday Gloom

In 1995, humanity’s last hope—Project Retrograde—collapsed as the underground world was shattered by the ancient parasite L.U.C.A. Play as a bounty hunter symbiotic with parasite, using its dangerous power to save the world, even if it consumes you.

Parasitic Combat

Infected by L.U.C.A, you survive and gain the ability to absorb combat memories from other hosts. Unlock parasitic skills, become a Kung Fu master or the Baba Yaga, and experience adrenaline-fueled combat!

Mysterious Underground

Delve into the post-apocalyptic realm filled with retro technology. Manipulate the LUX system to alter underground weather, or climb towers to reach unknown regions and uncover the truth buried for years.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

Thanks, IGN.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/narrative-driven-action-survival-game-project-retrograde-the-becoming-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

item.title: ROMEO IS A DEAD MAN ‘Extremely Bloody Action Buffet’ gameplay trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

One minute of ultra-violent action.

Grasshopper Manufacture has released a new gameplay trailer for “ultra-violent science-fiction” action game ROMEO IS A DEAD MAN, dubbed “Extremely Bloody Action Buffet.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Grasshopper Manufacture:

About

Take control of the protagonist Romeo Stargazer in this third person singleplayer action adventure, split into various chapters. His story is both unpredictable and littered with intense battles, interspersed with side missions to suit the player’s pace.

A Story That Transcends Space-Time

This game’s story starts with space-time itself being shattered by a certain incident. Romeo, too, on the brink of life and death finds himself revived by a new kind of super technology. Thus he is recruited for the FBI’s Space-Time Police as a special agent, and wanders the cosmos in search of criminals who’ve taken advantage of the situation at hand in an attempt to bring justice back to the universe. At the same time, he looks for clues concerning his missing girlfriend Juliet, and quickly comes to find both her disappearance and the destruction of space may be more linked than he thought. Donning the mask called Deadgear, what awaits Romeo at the edges of space-time?

Fight Blood With Blood

Romeo switches between swords and guns to fight. Wipe out the waves of enemies that stand in your path to give birth to a new kind of bloody action, and take down the fearsome space-time criminals that await. Absorb the blood of your enemies to unleash Romeo’s special attack: Bloody Summer, capable of turning any situation around. Romeo’s various weapons can be strengthened and altered as the story moves forward as he takes on even stronger enemies.

Grasshopper Manufacture’s Brand New Title!

ROMEO IS A DEAD MAN is Grasshopper Manufacture’s first brand new title in years! Players can expect a brand new unpredictable title that stands atop decades of experience!

ROMEO IS A DEAD MAN is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store in 2026.

Watch the trailer below.

Gameplay Trailer: Extremely Bloody Action Buffet



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/romeo-is-a-dead-man-extremely-bloody-action-buffet-gameplay-trailer

item.title: Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen ‘Overview’ and ‘Product Lineup’ trailers
item.content:encoded:
• Switch
  • Switch 2

Anticipated sequel due out on November 13 in Japan.

Konami has released two new trailers for board / party game sequel Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen.

The first trailer is a four-minute overview of the gameplay systems and features. The second introduces the game’s various SKUs, which are as follows:

  • Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen (physical or digital)
    • Switch version – 7,980 yen
    • Switch 2 version – 8,980 yen
  • Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen (digital)
    • Switch version – 6,430 yen
    • Switch 2 Upgrade Pass – 1,000 yen
    • Contains 559 stations and 3,340 properties
      • Compared to Momotaro Dentetsu: Showa, Heisei, Reiwa mo Teiban!‘s 339 stations and 2,201 properties
  • Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Nishi Nihon Hen (digital)
    • Switch version – 6,430 yen
    • Switch 2 Upgrade Pass – 1,000 yen
    • Contains 431 stations and 2,731 properties
      • Compared to Momotaro Dentetsu: Showa, Heisei, Reiwa mo Teiban!‘s 339 stations and 2,201 properties

Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen is due out for Switch 2 and Switch on November 13 in Japan. Read more about the game here.

Watch the trailers below.

Overview Trailer

Product Lineup Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/momotaro-dentetsu-2-anata-no-machi-mo-kitto-aru-higashi-nihon-hen-nishi-nihon-hen-overview-and-product-lineup-trailers
